chunks.chunk_text: Hi there!你想善用零碎時間學英語嗎?就在通勤學英語 15 minutes today!我是 John 老師!只要每日投入 15 分鐘,不論你在等咖啡、排隊或者是會議的空檔,都可以把這個短暫的空檔變成高效的英語練習。先聆聽一次我們提供的最新國際時事,再將節目資訊欄中的文字稿朗讀出來,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: 一句一個段落一個段落的跟讀我們的錄音檔。這樣子的小單元練習能夠快速累積你的成效,無縫融入你忙碌的一天,讓你不用額外擠出時間,也可以迎頭趕上英語的進步。Are you ready?再來,我們就開始今天的 shadowing activity!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: Let's think about what this means.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: Next, let's read this article in full.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: The ground-breaking team included pop star Katy Perry, journalist Gayle King, Jeff Bezos' fiance Lauren Sanchez, film producer Carrie Ann Flynn, former NASA scientist Aisha Boe, and civil rights activist Amanda Nguyen.The mission designated N.A.S.S.A.N.A.N.A.S.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.N.A.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json
RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: The crew returned safely to Earth, landing in the West Texas desert, assisted by three large parachutes.During their brief time in zero gravity, the women floated freely inside the capsule, gathering at the windows to marvel at Earth and the moon.Perry, known for her chart-topping hits, spontaneously sang Louis Armstrong's What a Wonderful World as they gazed at our planet from above, a moment King later described as really special.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: Each crew member brought unique meaning to the mission.Bow made history as the first Bahamian American in space and conducted several research experiments during the flight.Nguyen, a Nobel Peace Prize nominee, became the first Vietnamese and Southeast Asian woman astronaut.Sanchez, who reportedly conceived the all-women mission concept shortly after Bezos' own space journey, described looking back at Earth as profound.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: Noting how quiet yet alive our planet appeared.King, who has battled a lifelong fear of flying, called the experience transformative, stating afterward,I stepped out of my comfort zone in a way I never thought possible, and now I feel I can take on anything.After landing, the emotional crew members exited the capsule one by one, many dropping to their knees to kiss the ground in gratitude.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: The historic flight highlighted both the increasing accessibility of space tourism and its profound impact on those who experience it.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K983_ 太空史上的女性創舉 Women Make Space History.json

chunks.chunk_text: The mission represents a significant milestone for women in space exploration and inspires future generations of female astronauts.
